(Armor Negating [armornegating], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The Blood Burst causes the victims' blood to explode. Neither armor nor magic resistance can protect the targets. The spell demands large quantities of sacrificial blood and will exhaust even the most powerful of mages.
